text: Karsten Tadda (born November 2, 1988) is a German professional basketball player for EWE Baskets Oldenburg of the Basketball Bundesliga. He played for the German national basketball team. ==Professional career== Tadda spent most of his career with Brose Baskets, and won the German League four times with Bamberg. In October 2015, during the 2015–16 season, he transferred to Gießen 46ers.
